name: Wyvern
description: A large dragon-like creature with a long, barbed tail and powerful wings, known for its agility and fierce combat abilities.
memorable: Its venomous stinger can incapacitate prey, making it a dangerous aerial predator.
goals: To hunt large game and threaten travelers and livestock in its mountainous or wasteland habitat.
relations: May be encountered alongside other territorial predators or serve as a threat to weaker creatures.
environment: Remote, mountainous regions or desolate wastelands.
strengths: Impressive physical strength and agility in flight
weaknesses: Impaired flying ability when bloodied limits its mobility.
attacks: Uses multiattack with bite and stinger, along with claws from the air.
most_powerful_ability: Venomous stinger inflicts high poison damage.
senses: Possesses keen perception with a passive score of 14.
skills: Skilled at perception, making it aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Clumsy, vulnerable to being knocked down when grounded.
Imperfect Flight when bloodied reduces flying speed by half.
Can grapple targets while attacking from above.
Reflective Tail Whip can knock opponents prone.
test_queries: mountain dwelling dragon with barbed tail
dragon-like creature that hunts large game
creature that can grapple and poison enemies
